channel.title: New project [RSCMopar] - (coders check)
channel.description:
[b]Hello![/b]
Im here for just idea. RSCAngel is dead and something is missed now.. This community needs new server (imo - in my opinion)
[b]What exactly?[/b]
Strong and knowledge coder team, who can handle this new project.
Original RSC copy-paste.
That means when you create account, then you are nonmember player, you can make all nonmember skills and walk around nonmember area.
Original EXP!
Subscribers/donators/members can only access member area/skills etc, no exp boost or what eva you think about.
No new custom items/areas... Just like original RSC.
Respectable/famous server name. Like RSCDaemon/RSCStork/RSCAngel/RSCEmulation have.
Active developing team
2 servers nonmember and member world. or mixing them to one. Like if have subscriber/member status then you can walk trought gates etc.. access all member skills.
----------------------------------------
Now you want to say: "Why you don't make yourself that kind of server?"
I'm not that good to make.
I'm active reading person in this section and I know there are many good coders around here and (imo - in my opinion) should we gathering them all to one server. I'm not going to say names here, because I'm sure I will miss someone and I don't want this.
So what you guys think about it?

item.title: New project [RSCMopar] - (coders check)
item.dc:creator: @Ditzyy Ditzyy
item.description:
@Ditzyy wrote:

+1 on idea… even though it will never get done.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @Motaro Motaro
item.description:
@Motaro wrote:

These happens every couple of months… I actually don’t think there’s been any form of development in any of them.

Read full topic

item.title: New project [RSCMopar] - (coders check)
item.dc:creator: @mapu mapu
item.description:
@mapu wrote:

[quote=“ip0wns, post:1, topic:354333”]Hello!

Im here for just idea.
RSCAngel is dead and something is missed now…
This community needs new server (imo - in my opinion)

What exactly?

Strong and knowledge coder team, who can handle this new project.

Original RSC copy-paste.

That means when you create account, then you are nonmember player, you can make all nonmember skills and walk around nonmember area.

Original EXP!

Subscribers/donators/members can only access member area/skills etc, no exp boost or what eva you think about.

No new custom items/areas… Just like original RSC.

Respectable/famous server name. Like RSCDaemon/RSCStork/RSCAngel/RSCEmulation have.

Active developing team

2 servers nonmember and member world.
or mixing them to one. Like if have subscriber/member status then you can walk trought gates etc… access all member skills.

Now you want to say: “Why you don’t make yourself that kind of server?”

I’m not that good to make.

I’m active reading person in this section and I know there are many good coders around here and (imo - in my opinion) should we gathering them all to one server.
I’m not going to say names here, because I’m sure I will miss someone and I don’t want this.

So what you guys think about it?[/quote]
I take it you’re an only child.

If you want something done, do it yourself. Otherwise this is just another poorly structured topic which will not entice/motivate anybody worth having on the project to get off their ass.

Also it’s only because rsca went down that you’re writing this topic, you should move on.

Too lazy to de-rep you myself for this junk.

Read full topic

item.title: New project [RSCMopar] - (coders check)
item.dc:creator: @Nemesis1 Nemesis-
item.description:
@Nemesis1 wrote:

[quote=“king-pk, post:3, topic:354333”][quote author=snoopy89 link=topic=450628.msg3305340#msg3305340 date=1281626678]
I don’t see RSCEmulation is Respectable name. its just big never been Respectable thought.
RSCStork - never heard of.
[/quote]

Im with snoops on this one…

I would also steer away from naming server RSC anything imo… only bad has happened to people with long term domains like that!![/quote]
Except RSCAngel

Read full topic

item.title: New project [RSCMopar] - (coders check)
item.dc:creator: @snoopy89 snoopy89
item.description:
@snoopy89 wrote:

It seems like RuneScape.com can take over your website domain if you include RS, RSC, etc. As they did with RSbot.org.

apparently they send you a mail to see what the RS means in your site, so its probably the best to say it means rocket sience(the movie), lol

Read full topic
